title: Chongfeng Hao
synopsis: "The trumpet sounded, awakening the sleeping dragon" 　　 Dream set sail, starting with children. The vagrant tiger was rescued by the troops and embarked on a new journey with the troops. He learned to play the trumpet and wanted to become a qualified trumpeter. However, he was criticized for making mistakes. He left the troops and continued to wander alone. A huge conspiracy was found in the army before him... Did he arrive in time to prevent the tragedy from happening? Can he sound a loud trumpet to complete his dream?(translated from douban)
